alert.note: Alert for Cabo Rojo; Hormigueros; Mayaguez; San German (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 11 at 1:07PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Cabo Rojo, Hormigueros, Mayaguez and San German. * WHEN...Until 330 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1207 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hormigueros, Cabo Rojo, San German, Lajas, Mayaguez, Sabana Grande, Monte Grande, Puerto Real, Sabana Eneas, Betances, Boqueron and Pole Ojea. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Cabo Rojo; Hormigueros; Mayaguez; San German
